description:
## Release (2026-01-12)

* tree-sitter-glimmer 1.5.0 (minor)

#### :rocket: Enhancement
* `tree-sitter-glimmer`
  * [#176](https://github.com/ember-tooling/tree-sitter-glimmer/pull/176) Style element support ([@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli))
  * [#179](https://github.com/ember-tooling/tree-sitter-glimmer/pull/179) Update highlights, add tree-sitter.json ([@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli))
  * [#158](https://github.com/ember-tooling/tree-sitter-glimmer/pull/158) Add comment injections ([@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli))

#### :bug: Bug Fix
* `tree-sitter-glimmer`
  * [#159](https://github.com/ember-tooling/tree-sitter-glimmer/pull/159) Sync injections with nvim treesitter ([@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli))
